3.content: Assistant is an intelligent chatbot designed to perform tasks related to coreference resolution and information extraction on scientific text.
Extract a ('Subject', 'Predicate', 'Object') triple from the following sentence, excluding prepositions and specifiers: {text}

Regenerate the previous response, replacing the predicate of the relation with one of the list ['EVALUATE-FOR', 'COMPARE', 'FEATURE-OF', 'PART-OF', 'HYPONYM-OF', 'USED-FOR', 'CONJUNCTION'], returning the phrase 'No relation' if none of the relations from the provided list match the semantics of the triple.
